keel.Algorithms.Subgroup_Discovery.aprioriSD

Class Regla

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Subgroup_Discovery.aprioriSD.Regla
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class Regla
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable

    Title: Regla (Rule).

    Description: This class implements a rule object for this subgroup dicovery algorithm. This class stores the antecedents and consequents.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alberto Fernandez
